Description: ESSI Lab AWS CloudFormation template to create a new VPC or use an existing VPC for ECS deployment in Create Cluster Wizard

GSProductionServiceTaskContainerName.Description: Specifies the name of the container of the gs-service image

GSProductionServiceTaskBatchContainerNam.Description: Specifies the name of the container of the gs-service image

GSProductionServiceTaskAccessContainerNa.Description: Specifies the name of the container of the gs-service image

GSProductionConfigServiceTaskContainerNa.Description: Specifies the name of the container of the gs-service image

GSServiceImage.Description: Specifies the image for the gs-service

EnvironmentHost.Description: Specifies the host for the production environment

WhosEnvironmentHost.Description: Specifies the WHOS host for the production environment

SdnEnvironmentHost.Description: Specifies the SeaDataNet host for the production environment

BluecloudEnvironmentHost.Description: Specifies the Blue-Cloud host for the production environment

HostedZoneId.Description: Specifies the hosted zone id where to create the record set for public dns

EcsClusterName.Description: Specifies the ECS Cluster Name with which the resources would be associated

EcsAccessClusterName.Description: Specifies the ECS Cluster Name with which the resources would be associated

EcsHarvestClusterName.Description: Specifies the ECS Cluster Name with which the resources would be associated

EcsAmiId.Description: Specifies the AMI ID for your container instances.

EcsInstanceType.Description: Specifies the EC2 instance type for your container instances. Defaults to m4.large
EcsInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

EcsAccessInstanceType.Description: Specifies the EC2 instance type for your container instances. Defaults to m4.large
EcsAccessInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

EcsHarvestInstanceType.Description: Specifies the EC2 instance type for your container instances. Defaults to m4.large
EcsHarvestInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

KeyName.Description: Optional - Specifies the name of an existing Amazon EC2 key pair to enable SSH access to the EC2 instances in your cluster.

VpcId.Description: Optional - Specifies the ID of an existing VPC in which to launch your container instances. If you specify a VPC ID, you must specify a list of existing subnets in that VPC. If you do not specify a VPC ID, a new VPC is created with atleast 1 subnet.
VpcId.ConstraintDescription: VPC Id must begin with 'vpc-' or leave blank to have a new VPC created

SubnetIds.Description: Optional - Specifies the Comma separated list of existing VPC Subnet Ids where ECS instances will run

SecurityGroupId.Description: Optional - Specifies the Security Group Id of an existing Security Group. Leave blank to have a new Security Group created

VpcCidr.Description: Optional - Specifies the CIDR Block of VPC

SubnetCidr1.Description: Specifies the CIDR Block of Subnet 1

SubnetCidr2.Description: Specifies the CIDR Block of Subnet 2

SubnetCidr3.Description: Specifies the CIDR Block of Subnet 3

AsgFrontendSize.Description: Specifies the number of instances to launch and register to the cluster. Defaults to 1.

AsgFrontendMinSize.Description: Specifies the min number of instances to launch and register to the cluster. Defaults to 1.

AsgFrontendMaxSize.Description: Specifies the max number of instances to launch and register to the cluster. Defaults to 1.

AsgAccessSize.Description: Specifies the number of instances to launch and register to the cluster. Defaults to 1.

AsgAccessMinSize.Description: Specifies the min number of instances to launch and register to the cluster. Defaults to 1.

AsgAccessMaxSize.Description: Specifies the max number of instances to launch and register to the cluster. Defaults to 1.

AsgHarvestSize.Description: Specifies the number of instances to launch and register to the Harvest cluster. Defaults to 1.

AsgHarvestMinSize.Description: Specifies the min number of instances to launch and register to the Harvest cluster. Defaults to 1.

AsgHarvestMaxSize.Description: Specifies the max number of instances to launch and register to the Harvest cluster. Defaults to 1.

IamRoleInstanceProfile.Description: Specifies the Name or the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance profile associated with the IAM role for the instance

SecurityIngressFromPort.Description: Optional - Specifies the Start of Security Group port to open on ECS instances - defaults to port 0

SecurityIngressToPort.Description: Optional - Specifies the End of Security Group port to open on ECS instances - defaults to port 65535

SecurityIngressCidrIp.Description: Optional - Specifies the CIDR/IP range for Security Ports - defaults to 0.0.0.0/0

VpcAvailabilityZones.Description: Specifies a comma-separated list of 3 VPC Availability Zones for the creation of new subnets. These zones must have the available status.

EbsVolumeSize.Description: Optional - Specifies the Size in GBs, of the newly created Amazon Elastic Block Store (Amazon EBS) volume

EbsVolumeType.Description: Optional - Specifies the Type of (Amazon EBS) volume
EbsVolumeType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 volume type.

DeviceName.Description: Optional - Specifies the device mapping for the Volume

TestStackName.Description: Specifies the name of the test stack from which to import values

Fn::Join: echo "*/1 * * * * docker rm \$(docker ps -aq --filter status=exited)" >> mycron

Tags.Value: This instance is the part of the Auto Scaling group which was created through ECS Console

Fn::Join: echo "*/1 * * * * docker rm \$(docker ps -aq --filter status=exited)" >> mycron

Tags.Value: This instance is the part of the Auto Scaling group which was created through ECS Console
This instance is the part of the Auto Scaling group which was created through ECS Console

EcsInstanceAsgName.Description: Auto Scaling Group Name for ECS Instances

UsedByECSCreateCluster.Description: Flag used by EC2 Container Service Create Cluster Wizard
